channel.title: Help
channel.description:
after 1 min of been log in to my sever i get this
[client-1-owner mike]: Loading finished. [client-1-owner mike]: Loading finished. [client-1-owner mike]: Loading finished. [client-1-owner mike]: Auto saved game. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 20 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savemoreinfo(client.java:31998) at client.process(client.java:16244) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:141) at server.main(server.java:58)
then it say im already log on

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

public class StringIndexOutOfBoundsException
extends IndexOutOfBoundsException

Thrown by String methods to indicate that an index is either negative or greater than the size of the string. For some methods such as the charAt method, this exception also is thrown when the index is equal to the size of the string.

Since:
JDK1.0
See Also:
String.charAt(int), Serialized Form

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

There is an error when It tries to save your Characters file. Have you recently edited the ‘savemoreinfo’ boolean?

Read full topic

wow alot of people getting this lately.
